title: I Confess
overview: The girl agreed to her boyfriend to shoot an intimate video, but it was unexpectedly spread online by her boyfriend; Strange men take the initiative to approach and take care of the amnesiac person, seemingly well-intentioned but with ulterior motives; Internet celebrities love to share their personal lives, but they don't know that they have revealed secrets; Internet fortune tellers claim to know the future, but their own destiny has long been controlled by others...12 cutting-edge suspense documentary stories in the Internet era, about modern society problems, such as secret photography, online violence, workplace PUA, currency pyramid schemes, fundraising fraud, pig killing plates, beauty loans, etc., and invites scholars to interpret relevant legal issues. Unmask and reveal the truth. Each of their confessions provides a window into cybercrime in the Internet era.
